Uses of Interface
com.tectonica.jonix.JonixRecords.OnSourceEvent

Packages that use JonixRecords.OnSourceEvent
Package
Description
com.tectonica.jonix
 

  • Uses of JonixRecords.OnSourceEvent in com.tectonica.jonix

    Methods in com.tectonica.jonix with parameters of type JonixRecords.OnSourceEvent
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    JonixRecords
    JonixRecords.onSourceEnd(JonixRecords.OnSourceEvent onSourceEnd)
    Registers a listener for SourceEnd event, which occurs when after all records have been processed in the recently opened source.
    JonixRecords
    JonixRecords.onSourceStart(JonixRecords.OnSourceEvent onSourceStart)
    Registers a listener for SourceStart event, which occurs when a new source is about to be processed but only after the ONIX version and the (optional) ONIX Header have been parsed.
